person.persName: William Close, Sr. (Green County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier - Pvt. 13th Ky. Inf.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of James Close and Aleta Close. Married to Arena Bale Close in Green County, Kentucky, on January 7, 1857. Father of John Close and William Close, Jr. Attended school in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1850. Served in the 13th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from December 30, 1861 to January 12, 1865.
